title: Rifapin H 150MG 50ML Syp
formula:
Rifampicin 100 mg and INH 50 mg
Schazoo
details: This medication is used to treat tuberculosis and other infections.
precautions: Tell your doctorPharmacist your medical history of, Diabetes, Hepatitis, HIV infection, History of alcohol use/abuse. During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. When this drug is taken during the last few weeks of pregnancy, the risk of bleeding in both mother and infant may be increased. Tell your doctor right away if you notice any bleeding in your newborn. Rifampin passes into breast milk but is unlikely to harm a nursing infant. Consult your doctor before breast-feeding.
effects: Upset stomach, Heartburn, Nausea, Menstrual changes, or Headache may occur.

title: Pyrazid 500MG Tab 5x10 (L)
details: It is used to treat tuberculosis (TB) in adults and children.
precautions: Before taking pyrazinamide, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. You should not use pyrazinamide if you have active gout or severe liver disease.
effects: Nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, or mild muscle/joint pain may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Ethomid 250MG Tab 3x10 (L)
details: This is used to treat active Tuberculosis.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Liver disease, Kidney disease, Hypothyroidism, Optic neuritis, Cataracts, Diabetic retinopathy.
effects: Nausea, Vomiting, Diarrhea, Abdominal/stomach pain, Increased saliva, Strange metallic taste in the mouth, Loss of appetite, or Sores in the mouth may occur.

precautions: Myrin p forte tablet is important to use according to the precautions and the prescription of doctors.The most important precaution is to use this side effect after checking the history of the patient because patients can also suffer from degrees in the visual acuity. So, if someone is having treatment-related to optics, then this mission should not be used.For pregnant women, it is highly and strongly direction not to use this tablet, especially in this condition, because it can cause hazardous symptoms.
